TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 224

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 224

div1.p: Mine a Burton Received this 29 March 1813 from Moses Austin Esqr. Eight hundred and Seventy five pounds of Lead on acct of and order drawn by Lieut. Walter Wilkinson's order in my favour for $28 or nine hundred and thirty three pds of Lead
